patterns.name: Tailwind CSS v4 + Nuxt 4 Setup
patterns.description: Use @tailwindcss/vite plugin instead of @nuxtjs/tailwindcss module. Import plugin in nuxt.config.ts and add to vite.plugins array. CSS file uses @import 'tailwindcss' syntax.

taskLogs.implemented: Initialized Nuxt 4 project with v4-compat template, configured Tailwind CSS v4 with @tailwindcss/vite plugin, initialized shadcn-vue, added @nuxtjs/color-mode for system theme detection
taskLogs.learnings: Tailwind CSS v4 requires @tailwindcss/vite plugin instead of @nuxtjs/tailwindcss module. Use bun as package manager for faster installs.

taskLogs.implemented: Created TypeScript interfaces for RepoConfig, PrdListItem, PrdDocument, Task, TasksFile, ProgressFile and related types. All types match PRD schema with proper JSDoc documentation.
taskLogs.learnings: Nuxt 4 with app/ directory structure uses app/types/ for shared types. vue-tsc validates types correctly.
